## Description
Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Include relevant motivation and context.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactor (code improvement without functional change)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (Conventional Commits).
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] **Strict TDD:** I have written tests *before* implementing the code.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
- [ ] I have verified that this change does not compromise **Application Security**.
- [ ] I have updated documentation accordingly.
